summary:
Management Professional with extensive Multi- National experience associated with the Oil & Gas-  Petrochemical -Maritime & Wind Power Energy Industry. 
Working experience in several countries incl -Canada- USA - GCC - ( Bahrain -UAE -Kuwait -Qatar -KSA ) UK, Central & Eastern Europe - Monaco -& Scandinavia. 
Began Project Management career as a Project Control -Risk Analysis Consultant for O & G majors in the USA, ( Houston & California ). 
During mid /late 70's worked on major Oil & Gas Offshore Platform Construction Projects for the UK & Norwegian North Sea sectors for Shell & Mobil  (Deepwater concrete platforms -Brent C & Beryl B ) built in Norway.   .

Spent last 35 yrs + associated with Global Business Development for :
Technical Engineering -Industrial Labour & Construction  -Staffing support for both major EPC Oil & Gas Contractors & Manpower Service Companies working on Global Energy projects.

Experienced in following areas of Business Development - Management & Technical Recruitment /Consultancy.

>Project Management -Project Control -Project Risk Analysis
>Commercial Negotiation & Contractual expertise 
>Global Networking.
>Customer Focus / Customer Relations
>Creative Business Development skills
>Presentation & Communication Skills
>Technical Engineering Contract Recruitment
>Industrial Labour Recruitment /Staffing
>Search & Selection Permanent Project Staffing
>Contract Negotiation & Management
>Employment -Labour Law

profile_positions.location: Central /Eastern Europe -UK - Scandinavia & Middle East (all GCC Regions)
profile_positions.description: Since leaving the Middle East -Operating from the The Hague Netherlands providing Business Development for both a Portuguese E&I Service /Construction Co & since 2014 a Romanian Worldwide Technical Engineering & Industrial Labour Services Co with HQ in Bucharest, offices also established in UAE & the UK.  O&G BD activities currently associated with projects in global locations incl > UK, Central & Eastern Europe, N.Africa, Middle East -( all GCC regions ) & Scandinavia.

profile_positions.description:
Regional Manager Europe for Technical Engineering Agency Divisions > Aker Advantage / Ellayess /Aker International Resource- Recruitment Divisions based in Benelux for Process Engineering -Energy -Construction and Petrochemical Project Operations.

2003-2008 Responsible for all " ­In House" Agency Technical Recruitment for a Global Oil & Gas Process Engineering Construction Company.> Aker Kvaerner /Aker Solutions.
-Responsible for a team of Recruitment Staff - Admin & Payroll personnel whilst in -house of the 
 Aker Group company.
-Financial Control -ensuring manpower and financial targets of the group were met.
-Responsible for all HSE / Labour relations issues of the business unit.
-All Business Development & Sales for new clients and liaison with all Existing Clients.
-Contract Management of all Services, associated with clients and employees.
-Member of the Global Snr Management team - 
-Client Liaison, contract negotiation, evaluations and commercial discusions with clients.
profile_positions.title: Regional Manager Europe -Aker Advantage / Ellayess & Aker Int'nl Resources

profile_positions.description:
-Set-up Onstream's Netherlands Eng'rg Consultancy Services Division for Benelux Regions.
-Business Development for Dutch Sector North Sea Offshore Industry with Owner Operators - obtaining Manpower supply & Maintenance service contracts.
-Direct sales for Netherlands/Norway/Aberdeen/ Europe & Africa for Offshore Services Industry.
-Member of Board of Management -Int'nl Operations.

-Set up Warehouse Division in Den Helder NL for supplying Offshore platform Rental Eqpt .
-Financial control, budget control every day cost control.
-Preperation and total responsibility for Technical & Commercial Bid Proposals.
-Responsible for Tech Recruitment, selection,placement, contract negs, and Project Mngmt.
-Responsible for Legal, Commercial, tax and state authorities( SSM ) liaison.
-Responsible for major contract awards with Oil/Gas Operators NAM, SIPM,PLACID OIL
UNOCAL, MOBIL, LASMO, OCCIDENTAL,and CONOCO, plus others.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Benelux

development alternatives for Heidrun Field. Norway.

-Preperation of schedule & cost sections of Statement of Commerciality issued to Government
-Planning and Cost Control on Conceptual & Prelim Design phase of Engineering phase of Platform.
